name: Arabica
flavor: Sweet, soft, hints of fruit and sugar
description: Arabica beans are the most popular coffee beans worldwide, known for their smooth, mild flavor and aromatic qualities. They thrive at high altitudes and are prized for specialty coffees.

name: Robusta
description: Robusta beans have a bold, intense flavor and higher caffeine content. They are often used in espresso blends for their crema and strength.

name: Liberica
description: Liberica beans are rare and unique, with a distinctive aroma and flavor profile. They are cherished in Southeast Asia for their bold taste.

name: Excelsa
description: Excelsa beans add complexity to blends, offering tart and fruity notes. They are often used to enhance the depth of dark roasts.
